channel-type.label: LogStart
channel-type.description: Part of the Logging Event Set: 2/5 Actions: a) Start data collection(DC) b) LogStatus is set to 0 (running) c) DC is emptied(default) or extended according to arg'0' value d) DC Period is set according to arg'1' value Arguments '0': DC emptied(=0[default] or extended(=1) '1': set the DC Period (in sec): if=0 or absent[default] DC is stopped by LogStop action only.
